    • Method Detail

      • getCommandLineOptions

        public String[][] getCommandLineOptions()
        Description copied from class: KVImplementation
        Get the command line options supported by this implementation, suitable for display in a usage help message.

        There must be at least one option, to indicate that this implementation is to be used.

        Specified by:
        getCommandLineOptions in class KVImplementation<SQLDriverKVImplementation.Config>
        Returns:
        array of pairs: { option, description }

      • parseCommandLineOptions

        public SQLDriverKVImplementation.Config parseCommandLineOptions​(ArrayDeque<String> options)
        Description copied from class: KVImplementation
        Parse the specified command line options and return the resulting configuration, if possible.

        At least one option must be recognized, indicating that this implementation is to be used, otherwise null should be returned.

        Specified by:
        parseCommandLineOptions in class KVImplementation<SQLDriverKVImplementation.Config>
        Parameters:
        options - all command line options; upon return, recognized options should be removed
        Returns:
        configuration object representing the parsed options, or null if this implementation is not specified/configured

      • getDescription

        public String getDescription​(SQLDriverKVImplementation.Config configuration)
        Description copied from class: KVImplementation
        Generate a short, human-readable description of the KVDatabase instance configured as given.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        human-readable description

      • createSQLKVDatabase

        protected MSSQLKVDatabase createSQLKVDatabase​(SQLDriverKVImplementation.Config configuration)
        Description copied from class: SQLDriverKVImplementation
        Instantiate a SQLKVDatabase.

        This method does not need to configure the DataSource (via SQLKVDatabase.setDataSource()); the calling method will do that.

        Specified by:
        createSQLKVDatabase in class SQLDriverKVImplementation<SQLDriverKVImplementation.Config>
        Parameters:
        configuration - implementation configuration returned by parseCommandLineOptions()
        Returns:
        new key/value database
